document.full_text: pro-palestinian activists told israel on monday not to interfere in a planned aid flotilla to gaza in late june, barely a year after israeli commandos boarded an aid ship killing eight turks and one turkish-american.
document.title: gaza activists warn israel not to block new convoy
lines_and_colors: pro-palestinian activists told israel on monday not to interfere in a planned aid flotilla to gaza in late june, barely a year after israeli commandos boarded an aid ship killing eight turks and one turkish-american.
